auth.title: Get started
auth.description: How would you like to authenticate for this project?
auth.terms: Terms of Services and Privacy Notice for Gemini CLI

errors.invalidAuthType: Invalid value for GEMINI_DEFAULT_AUTH_TYPE: "{{value}}". Valid values are: {{validValues}}.
errors.existingApiKey: Existing API key detected (GEMINI_API_KEY). Select "Gemini API Key" option to use it.
errors.authRequired: You must select an auth method to proceed. Press Ctrl+C twice to exit.

settings.title: Settings
settings.instructions: Use ↑↓ navigate, ←→ for options, space toggle, numbers edit, Tab switch
settings.restartPrompt: Press r to exit and apply changes now, restart required for some changes.

folderTrust.title: Do you trust this folder?
folderTrust.description: Trusting a folder allows Gemini to execute commands it suggests. This is a security feature to prevent accidental execution in untrusted directories.

shellConfirm.title: Shell Command Execution
shellConfirm.description: A custom command wants to run the following shell commands:
shellConfirm.question: Do you want to proceed?

options.allowAlways: Yes, allow always for this session

editor.title: Select Editor
editor.instructions: (Use Enter to select, Tab to change focus)
editor.description: These editors are currently supported. Please note that some editors cannot be used in sandbox mode.
